credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
title: Girl Shelling Peas
provenance: Gift of Mrs. Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description: Horizontal view of a porch with a girl, facing right and looking down at bowl held in her lap, seated at left middle ground; at right middle ground outside edge of porch filled with boxes, dog house, bench covered with plants etc. is visible.  A door behind her in far wall gives a view of the distant sky in background.
name: Painting
